adjectives.description: depraved (comparative more depraved, superlative most depraved)

entries.meaning: Perverted or extremely wrong in a moral sense.
(archaic) Distorted out of the normal course; abnormal.
examples: There was a constant dripping of urine from the penis, a depraved appetite and meninguria. On examination, two calculi were easily felt, and I advised the owner that an operation was all that would save his animal  [â€¦]

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of deprave
